dublinCore.dc:title: 96 HR 5962 IH: Mount Blue Sky Wilderness Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself and Ms. Pettersen) introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the Mount Evans Wilderness as the Mount Blue Sky Wilderness, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Mount Blue Sky Wilderness Act.

section.header: Redesignation of the Mount Evans Wilderness as the Mount Blue Sky Wilderness

subsection.text: Section 102(a)(10) of Public Law 96â€“560 (16 U.S.C. 1132 note; 94 Stat. 3267) is amended by striking as the Mount Evans Wilderness; and inserting as the Mount Blue Sky Wilderness;.
Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Mount Evans Wilderness shall be deemed to be a reference to the Mount Blue Sky Wilderness.
